result.arabic_text: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّحۡضَرُونَ
result.translation: They cannot help them, yet they serve them as their dedicated guards[21].
result.footnotes: [21] Or their idols or so-called gods will be assembled to witness the punishment of their worshipers on the Day of Judgment.
